column1: Scope 2: Indirect Emissions from Electricity Purchases

This section includes emissions from all stationary combustion of fossil fuels done in direct proportion to an energy source purchased by the institution; i.e. purchased electricity and steam generated outside the geographic/control boundaries set in the introduction, yet consumed within them.
Calculating kWH of Carbon Emitting Electricity Sources
in bounds kWh from GMP grid

column23: Note: GMP's fuel mix for the electricity MC purchases was 100% carbon neutral and 68% renewable as of 2020: https://greenmountainpower.com/energy-mix/
